#EBA has now a more explicit mandate to ensure that risks of #ML and #TF are incorporated into the supervisory strategies and practices of all relevant authorities. EBA has also recently been mandated to develop #GLs detailing various aspects of the cooperation requirement.

Prudential supervisors need to👀 #ML/#TF risks when authorising/ assessing:
 
1/ institution/ acquisitions of qualifying holdings
